config.tritium.title: âš™ Tritium Config
config.tritium.performance.bambooLight.t: Skip lighting calculations for bamboo to improve performance
config.tritium.clientOptimizations.fastL: Optimize language switching by skipping full resource pack reload
config.tritium.entities.optimizeEntities: Optimize entity ticking to improve performance
config.tritium.entities.tickRaidersInRai: Keep raiders ticking during raids to prevent raid issues
Horizontal range in blocks for entity tick optimization (1-256)
config.tritium.entities.verticalRange.to: Vertical range in blocks for entity tick optimization (1-256)
Entities that will never be optimized (always ticked)
config.tritium.techOptimizations.lambdaE: Optimize event listeners using lambda expressions for better performance
config.tritium.serverPerformance.noiseSa: Cache noise sampling to improve server performance
config.tritium.serverPerformance.asyncWo: Enable asynchronous world saving to reduce server lag
Timeout in seconds for asynchronous world save
config.tritium.rendering.leafCulling_hid: Do not render leaf blocks that are fully enclosed by leaves or solid blocks
config.tritium.rendering.leafCulling_ena: Use async ray-trace occlusion test for leaf faces (cached; conservative when uncertain)
